name: part_012
file: tmp_Airani iofifteen Birthday 2025 3D Live, Have a Nice Trip and Dream #iofiLucidDream [mMDPWutdkDM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Airani Iofifteen performs her original song 'Kokoro no Sakamichi' on a dreamy cosmic stage. Korone and Moona appear as on-screen guests during the performance.
The live stream ends with a 'Lucid Dream' themed outro illustration featuring Iofifteen sleeping among chibi versions of other Hololive members.

subtitles.original: 破けちゃったジーンズと
subtitles.english: In torn-up jeans and

subtitles.original: 心の隙間に
subtitles.english: a heart with a crack,

subtitles.original: 冷たい風が抜ける
subtitles.english: The cold wind gently passes through.

subtitles.original: 小石蹴飛ばして一歩
subtitles.english: I kick a pebble as I move on too.

subtitles.original: 踏み出すとき君が
subtitles.english: The moment I take a single step ahead,

subtitles.original: いてくれてたんだ
subtitles.english: I found you standing there instead.

subtitles.original: 何度も苦しい思いをした
subtitles.english: I've been through pain more times than I can say,

subtitles.original: 何度も悲しい思いもした
subtitles.english: I've felt the sorrow that wouldn't go away.

subtitles.original: 今日までたくさん歩いてきた
subtitles.english: Step by step, I've made it here today.

subtitles.original: 心の坂道は
subtitles.english: Up the hill where my feelings lay...

subtitles.original: 君がいたから強くなれた
subtitles.english: Because you were there for me, I found the strength to be.

subtitles.original: 傷だらけでもあの坂も歩けた
subtitles.english: Even with scars, I climbed that hill with ease.

subtitles.original: 君がいるから歩いて行けるさ
subtitles.english: Because you're here with me, I know I'll keep walking free.

subtitles.original: 涙の足跡残さないで
subtitles.english: Leaving no trails for the world to see.

subtitles.original: あの日君は言ってた
subtitles.english: That day, you said to me,

subtitles.original: 本当の強さは泣いてもまた笑えることだよ
subtitles.english: True strength is being able to cry, then smile again, you know?

subtitles.original: 何度も苦しい思いをした
subtitles.english: I've been through pain more times than I can say,

subtitles.original: 何度も悲しい思いもした
subtitles.english: I've felt the sorrow that wouldn't go away.

subtitles.original: 今日までたくさん歩いてきた
subtitles.english: Step by step, I've made it here today.

subtitles.english: Up the hill where my feelings lay...

subtitles.original: 君がいたから強くなれた
subtitles.english: Because you were there for me, I found the strength to be.

subtitles.original: 傷だらけでもあの坂も歩けた
subtitles.english: Even with scars, I climbed that hill with ease.

subtitles.original: 君がいるから歩いて行けるさ
subtitles.english: Because you're here with me, I know I'll keep walking free.

subtitles.original: 涙の足跡残さないで
subtitles.english: Leaving no trails for the world to see.

subtitles.original: 君がいたから
subtitles.english: Because you were there for me...

subtitles.original: 君がいるから
subtitles.english: Because you're here with me...
